mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.oa_task_id AS "oaTask.id", a.send_user_id AS "sendUser.id", a.rece_user_id AS "receUser.id", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.reply_flag AS "replyFlag", a.reply_content AS "replyContent", a.reply_date AS "replyDate", a.year AS "year", a.month AS "month", a.day AS "day"
LEFT JOIN oa_task_record b ON b.id = a.oa_task_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO oa_task_reply( id, oa_task_id, send_user_id, rece_user_id, remarks, del_flag, reply_flag, reply_content, reply_date, year, month, day ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{oaTask.id}, #{sendUser.id}, #{receUser.id}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{replyFlag}, #{replyContent}, #{replyDate}, #{year}, #{month}, #{day} )
mapper.update: UPDATE oa_task_reply SET oa_task_id = #{oaTask.id}, send_user_id = #{sendUser.id}, rece_user_id = #{receUser.id}, remarks = #{remarks}, reply_flag = #{replyFlag}, reply_content = #{replyContent}, reply_date = #{replyDate}, year = #{year}, month = #{month}, day = #{day} WHERE id = #{id}
